name: Pacific Outdoor Advertising
description:
Pacific Outdoor Advertising is Portland’s leader in Out-of-Home Advertising, providing complete market coverage throughout the Portland DMA.  
With over 1,000 displays, Pacific Outdoor offers unmatched levels of reach and frequency for your advertising message.
 
Pacific Outdoor Advertising was founded in 2015 taking over what was the original Foster and Kleiser billboard plant that began in Portland in 1901.
